Catalano.MachineLearning

Class TabuSearchExploration

  • java.lang.Object
    • Catalano.MachineLearning.TabuSearchExploration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IExplorationPolicy

    public class TabuSearchExploration
extends java.lang.Object
implements IExplorationPolicy
    Tabu search exploration policy. The class implements simple tabu search exploration policy, allowing to set certain actions as tabu for a specified amount of iterations. The actual exploration and choosing from non-tabu actions is done by base exploration policy.

      • ChooseAction

        public int ChooseAction(double[] actionEstimates)
        Description copied from interface: IExplorationPolicy
        The method chooses an action depending on the provided estimates. the estimates can be any sort of estimate, which values usefulness of the action (expected summary reward, discounted reward, etc).
        Specified by:
        ChooseAction in interface IExplorationPolicy
        Parameters:
        actionEstimates - Action estimates.
        Returns:
        Returns selected action.

      • ResetTabuList

        public void ResetTabuList()
        Reset tabu list. Clears tabu list making all actions allowed.
